com.busit

Interface IMessage

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IMessageList

    public interface IMessage
    This interface defines the basic public properties of a message that wraps data accross connectors. All messages are encrypted and digitally signed, this interface voluntarily does not provide control over it. The reason is : you cannot encrypt or sign a message on behalf of anyone because you are not a trusted authority.

    • Method Detail

      • file

        InputStream file(String name)
        Get a file attached to this message.
        Parameters:
        name - the file name
        Returns:
        the file content or null if there is no matching file name

      • file

        void file(String name,
        InputStream data)
        Add or replace a file as attachment to this message
        Parameters:
        name - the file name
        data - the file data

      • files

        Set<Map.Entry<String,InputStream>> files()
        List all files attached to this message
        Returns:
        the list of files as a name/content tuple

      • content

        IContent content()
        Get the message content
        Returns:
        the message content, this is never null

      • content

        void content(IContent data)
        Set the message content
        Parameters:
        data - the message content. If null, it is converted to an empty content

      • clear

        void clear()
        Removes all files and sets an empty content

      • copy

        IMessage copy()
        Returns a shallow copy of this message. The content will be deep copied, but the files content will be referenced and not copied.
        Returns:
        the message copy

      • from

        String from()
        Get the identity of the sender of this message
        Returns:
        the sender identity principal (DN)

      • to

        String to()
        Get the identity of the receiver of this message
        Returns:
        the receiver identity principal (DN)
